duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate and build a book of residual income through business-to-business sales and client acquisition.
Utilize persuasive skills to optimize and expand professional network for business promotion and sales.
Prioritize opportunities and manage multiple touch points to drive outcomes and revenue growth.
Engage in face-to-face and phone sales activities to promote and sell products and services to business owners.
Maintain client relationships and focus on future revenue growth through account management and client renewal.
Demonstrate compelling and persistent communication to bring concepts to life and drive client engagement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, Marketing, or related field (Master's preferred)
